mapper.sql: policy_no, endorse_no, addr_no, prop_no, addition_seq, addition_no, addition_name, amt, prem, prercv_rate, limit, limit_year, limit_rate, rate, deduct_rem, mercno
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from fri_policy_addition
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fri_policy_addition (policy_no, endorse_no, addr_no, prop_no, addition_seq, addition_no, addition_name, amt, prem, prercv_rate, limit, limit_year, limit_rate, rate, deduct_rem, mercno) values (#{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{propNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{additionSeq,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{additionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{additionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prercvRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{limitYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductRem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mercno,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into fri_policy_addition
policy_no,
endorse_no,
addr_no,
prop_no,
addition_seq,
addition_no,
addition_name,
amt,
prem,
prercv_rate,
limit,

mercno,

mapper.update:
update fri_policy_addition
policy_no = #{record.policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endorse_no = #{record.endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_no = #{record.addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
prop_no = #{record.propNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
addition_seq = #{record.additionSeq,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
addition_no = #{record.additionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addition_name = #{record.additionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amt = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem = #{record.prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prercv_rate = #{record.prercvRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
limit = #{record.limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
limit_year = #{record.limitYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
limit_rate = #{record.limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rate = #{record.rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deduct_rem = #{record.deductRem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mercno = #{record.mercno,jdbcType=CHAR},

update fri_policy_addition set policy_no = #{record.policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endorse_no = #{record.endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_no = #{record.addrNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, prop_no = #{record.propNo,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, addition_seq = #{record.additionSeq,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, addition_no = #{record.additionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addition_name = #{record.additionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amt = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem = #{record.prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prercv_rate = #{record.prercvRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, limit = #{record.limit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, limit_year = #{record.limitYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, limit_rate = #{record.limitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rate = #{record.rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deduct_rem = #{record.deductRem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mercno = #{record.mercno,jdbcType=CHAR}
